text: "Tush" is a 1975 song by ZZ Top from their fourth studio album Fandango!. It has a running time of 2 minutes and 15 seconds in length. It went to number 14 in Canada and number 20 in the United States. ==Other websites== * == References == Category:1975 songs Category:ZZ Top songs Category:Blues rock songs
title: Tush (ZZ Top song)
